channel.title: Continuous Integration on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Continuous Integration on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Continuous Integration and Deployment: A Developer's Best Friends
item.description: Intro In today’s fast-paced software development landscape, Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) have become indispensable tools for developers. If you are already familiar with this concept, this post may not be for you. However, if you’re new to CI/CD and want to learn what it is, how to set it up, and why it’s cool, you’re in the right place. CI/CD can eliminate some manual labor, streamline workflows, and make your development process more efficient and reliable.
